column5: Hello all, My wife and i are planning to take our little boy over to Center Island in Toronto This Morning Monday Sept 17th If anyone could give me some spots to check i would greatly appreciate it as for my son it will be his first time casting and im sure i can find pan fish all over, but Mummy and Daddy want to fish too any suggestions ? And ill be sure to document our day there.....so look for updates by tonight  Thank you in advance !!
